e="preserve">Florence Littauer (April 27, 1928 – July 11, 2020) was a American Christian self-help author and public speaker. Littauer was best known for her series of books based upon the Personality Plus personality system. She was listed as one of Helen K. Hosier's "100 Christian Women Who Changed the Twentieth Century". She received the National Speakers Association's Council of Peers Award for Excellence.
Littauer was born in Haverhill, Massachusetts. She died on July 11, 2020 at the age of 92.
